name: Magicmoon 2-Pack 24 Inch Computer Privacy Screen Filter, Anti-Spy/Glare Protector Film for Widescreen Monitor with 16:9 Aspect Ratio (Width x Height: 531mm x 298mm)
short_description: Compatible Model(s): Magicmoon brand filter only for 24 inch -diagonally measured - widescreen monitor - aspect ratio 16:9 - filter size: width: 20 15/16", Height: 11 13/16" (531mm x 298mm)

Superior Privacy: The computer privacy filter makes the screen appear dark when looking at it from an angle (the angle is about 30 to 60 degree), but bright when looking directly at it. To change the privacy level - simply adjust your monitor’s brightness accordingly

Eye and Screen Protection: Privacy Filter does not only protect your private life but also protects your eyes by blocking 30% of blue light , blocking the harmful blue light between 380 to 495 nm, it filters out the blue light and relieves eye strain
Perfect For Open Workspaces: Great for maintaining screen privacy in open work spaces

Includes Two Options: Option 1 uses clear adhesive strips that securely attach to any computer screen. Option 2 (for computer screens with a raised bezel only) uses slide mount tabs that easily stick to the display frame, allowing you to slide the privacy screen filter on and off as needed
product_description: Please Note: 1. Find Your Privacy Filter: Very Important to measure and double check your screen's Width and Height measurements before ordering. It's not recommended to make your selection based solely on your computer screen's diagonal size. 2. Does Not Block Visibility Behind You-Privacy screens work by blocking light from certain angles. As a result, anyone within your privacy filter's 60 degree viewing angle will be able to read your screen, regardless of distance. 3. Not Compatible with Touchscreens. Easy installation, 1 of 2 ways! 1. The clear adhesive attachment strips option allows you to apply the privacy filter directly onto your monitor. 2. The sliding mount tabs option allows you to install two mounting tabs on the frame of your monitor to easily take the privacy screen on and off. Package Contents: 2 x privacy screen 2 x attachment part sets (Each attachment part set contains 1 pair of plastic tabs and 1 sheet of double-sided tape) 1 x installation guide card
